General.Name: Iep Invest
General.Description: Iep Invest, NV is an investment firm specializing in investments in and loans to real estate companies. The firm previously operated as manufacturing group. It was formerly known as Punch International nv and changed its name to Iep Invest, NV in May 2014. Iep Invest, NV was founded in 1982 and is based in Antwerp, Belgium.
